issue.title: [Rust] Add documentation and make some fields private
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2445](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2445). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A first pass at adding rustdoc comments and made some struct fields private and added accessor methods.
